PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09672021-11-27,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Prohibition of Entry into Canada - Specified Countries)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (PROHIBITION OF ENTRY - SPECIFIED COUNTRIES) in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) prohibit entry of foreign nationals based on their 14-day travel history from any country identified by the Chief Public Health Officer as having an outbreak or at risk of having an outbreak of the Omicron variant, with limited exceptions; and (3) extend the restrictions on entry into Canada until January 31, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
